transport.question: I have wheels and go 'vroom vroom'! What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 I can be big or small
🚦 I need roads to drive on
👪 You can ride in me with your family

transport.question: I float on water and can carry lots of people. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I need a big body of water
⚓ I might have a horn that goes 'toot toot!'
🚢 I'm bigger than a rowboat

transport.question: I fly in the sky and have wings. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I go very high!
✈️ I have engines to help me fly
🌍 I can take you to far away places

transport.question: I go on tracks and carry many passengers. What am I?

hints.text: 🚂 I have lots of carriages behind me.
📢 I often go 'choo choo!'
🚦 I stop at stations

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 🔔 I might have a bell!
🚴 I need you to push the pedals around
🛣️ You can ride me on a path

transport.question: I carry lots of people around the city. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I stop to pick up people!
🚌 I am bigger than a car.
🎟️ You need a ticket to ride me.

transport.question: I can fly straight up and down. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I have a big spinning blade on top!
🏥 Sometimes I help people who are sick or hurt.
📍 I can land in small places.

transport.question: I'm like a train, but run on roads in the city.

hints.text: 🚦 I sometimes share the road with cars
🚃 I am powered by electricity from above
🔔 I often travel through the city centre

transport.question: I help people get around quickly for a fee. What am I?

hints.text: 🚕 I have a meter to keep track of the cost
🚖 I can be hailed or booked
📍 I can drop you where you need to go

transport.question: I take people to space! What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I'm very powerful!
👩‍🚀 Astronauts travel in me
🌎 I leave earth and explore the stars!

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Sometimes you eat me with your lunch. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 I am often crunchy.
🐰 Bunnies love to eat me.
🥗 I can be put in a salad.

plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and sometimes a pretty smell. People give me as a gift. What am I?

hints.text: 🌸 I can be many different colors.
💧 I need water to grow.
💐 You can put me in a vase.

plant.question: I grow on a tree and monkeys like to eat me. I am yellow and yummy. What am I?

hints.text: 🌴 I grow in warm places.
🐒 I'm easy to peel.
🍌 My name is a color and also a fruit.

plant.question: I am big and tall and have many leaves. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.
🌳 I have a trunk made of wood.
🍂 My leaves change color in the fall.

plant.question: I am small and green and grow in your yard. You can walk and play on me. What am I?

hints.text: ⚽ You can play games on me.
🌱 I am made of many little blades.
🐑 Some animals like to eat me.

plant.question: I am red and round and grow on a vine. You can make sauce out of me. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I need lots of sunshine to grow.
🍝 I taste good on pizza.
🍅 My name starts with the letter 'T'.

plant.question: I have sharp needles instead of leaves and stay green all year round. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ People decorate me for Christmas.
🌲 I am a type of evergreen tree.
🐻 Some bears live in forests of my kind.

plant.question: I have a hard shell and grow on a tree. Squirrels like to hide me for winter. What am I?

hints.text: 🌰 My shell can be cracked open.
🐿️ I am a favorite food for squirrels
🥜 I am called a nut.

plant.question: I'm a plant that climbs and twists, often found on walls or fences. Sometimes I have pretty flowers.

hints.text: 🧱 I can grow up buildings.
🪴 I need something to hold onto as I grow.
🌿 My name rhymes with 'divine'.

plant.question: I am a seed that is dried, you can pop me in hot oil and eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am yellow.
🍿 I make a tasty snack.
🌽 I come from a cob.
